text: Hi mate, really really sorry about the late reply, just been really busy with my hand in was alot of stuff to cover ahah I'm not bad thanks! How are you? How has 2020 been for you?

Hey dude, no worries at all! As long as your doing ok!

So far 2020 has been reallllllly busy. We are in the process of delivering a couple big sequences for a new Netflix show so been pretty intense at work getting all the shots done. I’ve been picking up some really nice shots and some using deep compositing which I haven’t really used before so there’s been a bit of a learning curve but I think I’ve worked out how it works now (until I break it and have to ask my supe what I’ve done wrong :joy:) 

I also got a job offer which I was considering but have since decided it wouldn’t have been a good move for me long term. 

How did your hand-ins go?
